overview.title: Game Overview
overview.description: This is a Three Kingdoms-themed idle cultivation game. Players make skill selections and attribute allocations at the start, then the game progresses automatically through random events, city battles, general recruitment, and other mechanics to build your faction with the ultimate goal of unifying the realm.

gameFlow.title: Game Flow
steps: Complete 3 rounds of skill selection, choosing 1 from 3 random skills or skip each round
Remaining stars convert to attribute points
Game auto-progresses: Random Events → City Battles → General Recruitment → Level Up
Repeat cycle until realm unification or defeat

attributes.title: Attribute Descriptions
list: Intelligence: Affects skill success rate and damage
Leadership: Affects troop capacity and damage absorption
Politics: Affects city resource production and defense success rate
Charisma: Affects general surrender rate and automatic recruitment
Destiny: Hidden attribute affecting random event probabilities

tips.title: Game Tips
list: Skill selections affect the entire game, choose carefully
Destiny value is hidden but greatly influences game progression
Balanced development of all attributes is better than specializing
Legendary equipment can only be obtained through special events
Game supports multiple speeds, adjust as needed
